components.description:
A hair pick with a handle and several long teeth. Used to style hair, especially thick, curly hair. May be used as a symbol of Black culture or Black pride. 

May also be used to talk about grooming or self-care in general.

May be used metaphorically to refer to the verb comb, meaning "to carefully search."

version.description:
Unicode 15.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on September 13, 2022. 20 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 31 new emojis (including sequences) listed under Emoji 15.0.

apple_vendor_description: The hair pick emoji on Apple devices is rendered with a tactile appearance, featuring smooth, rounded prongs and a sturdy handle, all imbued with Apple‚Äôs characteristic realistic lighting and subtle shading. Its clean lines and polished finish suggest both utility and style, representing the act of grooming, self-care, or a nod to cultural pride and personal expression. This emoji is a subtle yet impactful addition to Apple's diverse emoji collection.
